tagline: Claim verification, source evaluation, and bias detection — the last line of defense before publish
pros: Systematic claim-by-claim verification with source trails
Statistical literacy — catches misleading data and cherry-picked studies
Bias detection including framing, omission, and false balance
Provides replacement language, not just error flags
cons: Thorough process takes time — not instant turnaround for long pieces
Checks facts, not style or rhetoric
Can't verify claims in domains with no public primary sources

model_recommendations.notes: Solid reasoning + good writing. Benefits from thinking but doesn't need max reasoning. Best cost/capability balance.
